entry.title: Tuesday: Light snow or rain. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Light snow changing to periods of rain late this afternoon. Risk of freezing rain this afternoon. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h this afternoon. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 6 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Tuesday 07 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of rain or snow. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of snow mixed with rain changing to rain this evening and ending after midnight then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries or drizzle. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Local rainfall amount 2 mm. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming northeast 30 gusting to 50 this evening. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Tuesday 07 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near plus 1. POP 40%
